dmca.title: Mark of the Triangle
dmca.body:
We are trademark and copyright attorneys for Al-Anon Family Group Headquarters, Inc.  Our client requested that we write to you regarding the unauthorized use of its trademarks and copyrights on your Internet web site at www.soberrecovery.com.  Our client informs us that it has previously written to ask you to remove infringing trademarks and copyrights from your web site.  No response was ever received.  
 
As you undoubtedly know, our client is the owner of the famous mark AL-ANON and the Al-Anon triangle logo (the
